captions.text: You Are in Prison and  You Think you Are Free
I am speaking to you and I am fully aware from where these words are coming
they are coming from my nothingness. I don't find any other place from where they are coming.
Nothingness is not nothing. Nothingness is all.
And to recognize nothingness as all, as an experience, is the only way  to find your unity with the universe.
If you wish to get out of prison,
the first thing you must do
is realize that you are in prison.
If you think you are free, you can't escape."
What are the prisons that I call "home"?
He is unique in many ways
the way Gurdjieff has said them.
towards the liberation of human consciousness.
You are asking about one of his
and instead of saying, "You are in prison,"
he would say, "You are the prison."
If you wish to get out of prison
or better to say, if you don't want to be a prison
the first thing you must do is
realize that you are in prison...or
to be always remembered as one of the first principles
The tendency of the human mind is
to deny those things which are ugly,
to hide in such a way,
in such depths of the unconscious
OSHO is a registered Trademark of OSHO International Foundation

title: OSHO: You Are in Prison and You Think You Are Free (Preview)

comments.text: I love Osho.....﻿
comments.author: Vicente García

comments.text:
After experiencing the teachings of Gurdjieff and Osho I come to the point 
to understand that Osho's meditations are based a lot in Gurdjieff's work. 
I feel like the Works of these two Masters are so deeply connected. I feel 
gratitude to Gurdjieff for the valuable material that he offered and to 
Osho for giving it such a form that it's easier for humans of different 
spiritual levels to understand.﻿
comments.author: Georgios Aletras

comments.text:
He's talking about the most incredibly simple thing in the world: the 
prison of your mind. Once you realize you are not your thoughts, that they 
are the servant and not the master, you begin to awaken and everything 
opens up. Your mind holds your prison keys and will do anything to convince 
you it is who you are, but you can break out!

comments.text:
@markangeloc awakening is easy,the main trigger for me was when I realised 
the person,the small mind made self/ego,(mind body) was not who I am. It 
was conditioned,brainwashed into believing I was a separate individual. 
Trace yourself back to a toddler,when did you become self aware? up to that 
point you were like any other animal,unaware of gender,name,unaware of 
anything,yet you had been alive for 2-3 years! you were then brainwashed to 
identify with mind and form ,you are really awareness.

comments.text:
People are not poor because they have chosen to be poor..Those who are poor 
are conditioned it that situation.When OSHO talks about money he hasn't 
defined the term enough.Money is the couse of most aberrant and destructive 
human behaviours.Money doesn't offer you all the necessary comforts in 
life,it is designed to do so (if you are "lucky"),but resources are 
abundant for all people to enjoy sheltered life-intelligently utilised and 
shared worlds resources -not money we need!
